title: 'Gangsta' font
content:
Ok I'm trying to find this tattoo/gangsta font:  
'The Masterpiece' part.  
I know the rest of the Snoop logo is not available to the public ( [http://www.typophile.com/node/21299](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205072950/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21299)) but I have seen 'The Masterpiece' font so many times i just don't know where to get it.

PLEASE HELP!!!! :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [SnoopLogo\_5438.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205072950/http:/typophile.com/files/SnoopLogo_5438_0.jpg) | 169.52 KB |
author: JadeReece

comments.content: I'm not sure you've seen the "Masterpiece" "font" many times. It looks handwritten to me and not a font at all (note that all the 'e's are different). Maybe what you _have_ seen is stuff in a similar style, such as [Affair](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205072950/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000181), [Ministry](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205072950/http:/www.veer.com/partner/link.aspx?i=1048&c=4&p=products/typedetail.aspx?image=UMT0000149), and [Skin Deep](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205072950/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/skin-deep-bb/?refby=typographica).

your a legend!  
cheers for the similar styles

'The Masterpiece' is custom lettering from Mr. Cartoon

[http://www.mistercartoon.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205072950/http:/www.mistercartoon.com/ "http://www.mistercartoon.com/")

another example

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205072950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/cartoonw_6339_3906.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205072950im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SnoopLogo_5438_0_5532.jpg)
